import React, { Component } from 'react' import LayoutDashboard from '../../components/LayoutDashboard' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' let bodyFormData = new FormData(); bodyFormData.set("title", "author", "category_name", "body_post", "status_post", "created_at", "update_at"); class CreatePost extends Component { state = { title: '', author: '', category_name: '', body_post: '', status_post: '', created_at: '' } postDataHandler = () => { let bodyFormData = new FormData(); bodyFormData.set( {title: this.state.title, author: this.state.author, category_name: this.state.category_name, body_post: this.state.body_post, status_post: this.state.status_post, created_at: this.state.created_at }); axios({ method: 'post', url: 'https://my-json-server.typicode.com/wahyufaturrizky/dbwahyu/posts', data: bodyFormData, headers: {'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data' } }) .then(function (response) { //handle success console.log(response); }) .catch(function (response) { //handle error console.log(response); }); } render () { return ( {/* Main Content */}
